data.message: , Dear sir I would like to draw your attention that "Mirpurkhas special sports association" is working for(Deaf&dumb"Blind"Physical handicapped"Meantly rataired children) for better life of especial childrens and creating the sport tallent . Therefore we implore your highness to kindly visit our institute to met and encourage special childrens and give your contributions for the well being of these sports stars.your contributions will help us boost our confidence and we may continue our struggle for the better future of the special champion more effectively. We hope optimistic response. Thanking you(Mehmood ghouri-+923003316410)e-mail. ghouriandu@yahoo.com
